description: Non material amendment to planning permission 21/03821/KPSID (Demolition of the existing CLASP building and the erection of a new 3 storey teaching block and adjoining sports hall to facilitate a 5 FE junior school, external works to the existing outdoor school playing areas, 2 no. Multi Use Games Areas (MUGA) (including one floodlit), new junior playground area, reconfiguration of internal access, new staff car parking area and cycle parking, works to the existing Victorian Block, new pedestrian access points, a new covered link, landscaping and other associated works. The school will be subject to a Community Use Agreement.) to allow addition of one external plant room door on the ground floor.
decision_conditions: The following approved plans listed under Condition 1 of planning permission ref: 21/03821/KPSID:- Pro Ground Flr Plan - Main Block - P134-1- Proposed Block - East & West Elevations - P332-2Are be replaced by:- Pro Ground Floor Plan - Main Block - P134-2- Pro Block - East & West Elevations - P332-3Additional drawing to be added to plans listed under Condition 1 of planning permission ref: 21/03821/KPSID:- Pro External Door Details - P140-1
